## Create a factor variable

```yaml
type: BlanksChallenge 
key: 1181G3PahkGLe
```

`@code`

```{r}
# blanks: [{from: [fun2, var2], choose: 2}]
var_char <- {{ var1 }}
var_f <- {{ fun1 }}(var_char)
{{ fun2 }}(letters_f) <- {{ var2 }}
var_f
```


`@pre_challenge_code`

```{r}
shared <- sample(3, 1)
gen_var1 <- function(){
  vec <- switch(shared, `1` = letters[1:2], `2` = c('n', 's'), `3` = c('e', 'w'))
  generate_char_vector(5, vec, replace = TRUE)()
}
gen_var2 <- function(){
  vec <- c("c('apple', 'bananas')", "c('north', 'south')", "c('east', 'west')")
  vec[shared]
}
```


`@variables`

```{yaml}
var1: "!expr gen_var1"
var2: "!expr gen_var2"
fun1: factor
fun2: levels
```
